title: A Window to trade
creator_credit: Film Australia, Elisabeth Knight and Susan Cornwell
brief_description: Shows the role of the International Trade Development Centres in advising and guiding business about the marketing of overseas products to Australia. Seminars are regularly conducted in all cities. Suitable for middle and upper secondary and tertiary levels.
